channel.title: Savage Lane — Updates
channel.description: New and updated guides, tools, and resources from Savage Lane Home Match Concierge.

item.title: Video Library — Curated Buyer & Seller Videos
item.description: Bite-sized explainers for buyers and sellers: first-time buyer tips, loan types, pre-listing inspection, FSBO pitfalls, and why working with an agent matters.

item.title: Buyer Resource Center — Refreshed Layout & FAQs
item.description: Clear, step-by-step guidance for buyers including credit basics, pre-approval, affordability, inspections, and closing.

item.title: Seller Resource Center — Refreshed Layout & FAQs
item.description: Everything sellers need to prepare, price, market, and close confidently, plus why partnering with a pro matters.

item.title: How Much House Can I Afford?
item.description: Understand DTI, down payments, and monthly budgeting before you shop.

item.title: FHA vs. Conventional vs. VA vs. USDA Loans — Explained
item.description: Compare common mortgage types, eligibility, and tradeoffs so you can choose confidently with your lender.

item.title: Buyer Credit Basics — Quick Wins
item.description: Practical tips to strengthen your credit profile before pre-approval.

item.title: Pre-Approval vs. Pre-Qualification
item.description: Know the difference and why sellers care — be offer-ready.

item.title: What Updates Add the Most Value Before Selling
item.description: High-impact, cost-effective improvements guided by market realities.

item.title: Benefits of a Pre-Listing Inspection
item.description: Reduce renegotiations, price confidently, and smooth your sale.

item.title: Why You Shouldn’t Sell Your Home Yourself (FSBO Pitfalls)
item.description: Legal exposure, pricing mistakes, limited reach — here’s why a pro pays.
